nodes.text: The Sabrashi were a group from the Sabrash system. They developed the Fear stick, a potent self-defense weapon that appeared to be a writing stylus.

The Sabrashi were created by Kathy Tyers for her novel The New Jedi Order: Balance Point. They were later referenced in The New Essential Guide to Weapons and Technology. Neither source clarifies the nature of the Sabrashi. They could be an organization, a culture or a species.
